This appears to be a UX issue where test settings can be modified while tests are running, causing Vitest to hang. To fix this:  1. Disable test settings controls while tests are running by modifying the test runner UI component 2. Add a `isRunning` state check before allowing settings changes 3. Add a loading/disabled state to the settings controls  The relevant code would likely be in the test runner UI components and test manager. Without access to the specific files, I cannot provide exact code locations. However, this would require:  - Adding state management for test run status - Disabling settings controls based on that state - Preventing settings changes during active test runs  This is a straightforward UI fix to prevent an edge case that causes Vitest to hang.
